name: Titanium.Android.Menu
summary: The Titanium binding of an Android Options Menu.

methods.name: add
methods.summary: Creates a Titanium.Android.MenuItem from the passed creation options.

parameters.name: options
parameters.summary:
Creation options. Supported options are
[itemId](Titanium.Android.MenuItem.itemId),
[groupId](Titanium.Android.MenuItem.groupId),
[title](Titanium.Android.MenuItem.title),
[order](Titanium.Android.MenuItem.order),
[actionView](Titanium.Android.MenuItem.actionView),
[checkable](Titanium.Android.MenuItem.checkable),
[checked](Titanium.Android.MenuItem.checked),
[enabled](Titanium.Android.MenuItem.enabled),
[icon](Titanium.Android.MenuItem.icon),
[showAsAction](Titanium.Android.MenuItem.showAsAction),
[titleCondensed](Titanium.Android.MenuItem.titleCondensed), and
[visible](Titanium.Android.MenuItem.visible).

methods.name: clear
methods.description: You should release all references you have retained to Titanium.Android.MenuItem previously created.

methods.name: findItem
methods.summary: Locates a Titanium.Android.MenuItem in this menu, by item ID or reference.
methods.description: Returns the identified menu item, or null if the menu item was not located.

parameters.name: item
parameters.summary: Integer [itemId](Titanium.Android.MenuItem.itemId) or a reference to a `MenuItem` object.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Returns null if no menu item exists at the specified index.

parameters.name: index
parameters.summary: Index of the menu item to return.

methods.name: hasVisibleItems
methods.summary: Returns true if this menu has visible items.

methods.name: removeGroup
methods.summary: Removes all menu items with the specified groupId.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.summary: Group ID of items to remove.

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.summary: Item ID of item to remove.

methods.name: setGroupEnabled
methods.summary: Enables or disables a group of menu items identified by a groupId.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.summary: ID of the group to enable or disable.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.summary: True to enable the specified group, false to disable it.

methods.name: setGroupVisible
methods.summary: Shows or hides a group of menu items identified by a groupId.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.summary: Group ID to enable or disable.

parameters.name: visible
parameters.summary: True to show the group, false to hide it.

properties.name: add
properties.summary: Array of menu items in this menu.
